src:
IndiHome Sempat Tumbang, Telkom Minta Maaf
05 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Indihome. Foto: Foto: detikINET/Achmad Rouzni Noor II

Jakarta - Telkom IndiHome mendadak masuk dalam perbincangan hangat netizen, terutama di Twitter di mana topik IndiHome berada di posisi 5 besar. Ternyata sebagian netizen itu mengeluhkan layanan Indihome tumbang."Gimana? Gimana? Indihome masih trouble ? Oouh.. sejauh ini sih, aku masih sabar banget #indihome," begitu salah satu komplain yang dilayangkan."Lagi addons domain disconnect, gua pikir server hostingnya yang error ternyata internet gua yang lagi cenat cenut #indihome," cetus netizen lain di linimasa."Kirain gue belom bayar wifi. Ternyata emang lagi down wkwk #Indihome," Ketika dikonfirmasi, pihak Telkom membenarkan telah terjadi gangguan akses internet internasional Telkom Group selama beberapa waktu. Untungnya, perbaikan berjalan lancar dan Telkom menyatakan semua layanan sudah kembali normal."Terkait adanya gangguan akses internet internasional TelkomGroup, dapat kami informasikan bahwa proses perbaikan telah selesai dilakukan," sebut VP Corporate Communication Telkom Indonesia, Arif Prabowo dalam keterangannya."Gangguan yang sempat terjadi selama 45 menit ini dapat disolusikan pada pukul 11:10 WIB. Saat ini semua layanan TelkomGroup sudah beroperasi normal," tambahnya"Telkom memohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang sempat dialami pelanggan yang terkena dampak gangguan. Proses recovery sudah selesai dilakukan dan pelanggan dapat menggunakan layanan TelkomGroup kembali seperti sedia kala. Kami terus berkomitmen memastikan kualitas infrastruktur jaringan produk dan layanan TelkomGroup untuk pengalaman terbaik pelanggan," pungkas Arif.Simak Video "Netizen Keluhkan Jaringan Internet Telkomsel dan IndiHome Terganggu"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fyk/fay)
text:
IndiHome Had fallen, Telkom apologized
05 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Indihome Photo: Photo: detikINET / Achmad Rouzni Noor II

Jakarta - Telkom IndiHome suddenly entered into the warm discussion of netizens, especially on Twitter where the topic of IndiHome is in the top 5 positions. It turned out that some netizens complained about the fallen service of Indihome. "How? How is it? Indihome is still having trouble? Oouh .. so far, I'm still very patient #indihome," was one of the complaints posted. "Again disconnect domain addons, I think the hosting server is the error turned out to be my internet which was cenut cindy #indihome, "said another netizen on the timeline." I didn't pay for wifi yet. It turned out that it was down again when #Indihome, "When confirmed, Telkom confirmed that there had been an interruption in Telkom Group international internet access during some time. Fortunately, the repair went smoothly and Telkom said all services had returned to normal. "Regarding the interruption of TelkomGroup international internet access, we can inform you that the repair process has been completed," said Telkom Indonesia VP Corporate Communication, Arif Prabowo in his statement. this 45 minutes can be resolved at 11:10 WIB. Now all TelkomGroup services are operating normally, "he added." Telkom apologizes for the inconvenience experienced by the affected customers. The recovery process has been completed and customers can use the services. TelkomGroup is back to the way it was before. We continue to be committed to ensuring the quality of TelkomGroup product and service network infrastructure for the best customer experience, "concluded Arif.Simak Video" Netizens Complain about Telkomsel and IndiHome Internet Networks Interrupted "[Gambas: Video 20seconds] (fyk / fay)
